hero.title: Hi! I'm Akilles.
hero.description: I code, make music and design things.

my-coding.title: My skills as a full stack developer
my-coding.description: As of 2024, I'm working full-time as a Full Stack Developer in fintech. I like to create neat utility scripts, write APIs, visualize data with plots and experiment with machine learning models using Python. I'm also maintaining anodet, an open source convolutional neural net anomaly detection model based on ResNet and PatchCore. While I'm currently in favor of backend development, I do have a passion for user interface and visual design. I enjoy building mockups and wireframes, creating digital marketing material and experimenting with different web frameworks. In 2024 I finished my studies at IT-HÃ¶gskolan ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡ª, where I graduated in machine learning.

my-ethics.title: AI Ethics
my-ethics.description:
I believe responsible AI is about owning up to the consequences of what we create. Whether it's avoiding bias in algorithms or being upfront about how data driven decisions are made, it's all about being accountable.

Then there's data integrity, the backbone of ethical AI. I make sure the data we feed our models is solid, reliable, and fair. Let's keep the data clean; garbage in, garbage out.

my-music.title: I also produce music
my-music.description:
I've been creating electronic music for over 10 years and I enjoy all aspects of it, from the creative composition and chord improvisation to the mathematical signal processing and mixing techniques. 

 The genres I'm moving between are mainly dubstep, hip hop, some drum & bass and house. I've experimented with psy-trance and lofi hip hop and produced some video game music.

my-stack.title: What I work with
my-stack.description1:
Short answer: Python, JavaScript/TS, C#, SQL Long answer:

Machine Learning and Data Science

As a developer interested machine learning, I have experience working with Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch and sklearn for building and managing machine learning models. As my work involves cleaning and processing data, Iâ€™m well-versed in data pipelines. My data collection skills extend to web scraping with tools like Selenium and bs4. For statistical analysis I rely heavily on Pandas. When it comes to data visualization, Iâ€™m proficient with matplotlib, seaborn, and plotly, consistently using these libraries to create informative and appealing plots.

Web Development and Engineering

In terms of backend development, Iâ€™ve created APIs with Flask and SQLAlchemy, and Iâ€™m comfortable managing databases with PostgreSQ, MongoDB and GraphQL. As a Data Engineer, Iâ€™ve designed and managed scalable data pipelines and infrastructure using Azure DevOps and Google BigQuery. Though my work primarily focuses on data, I also enjoy web development, where I use frameworks like Anvil, Streamlit and React+Node.js. But Iâ€™m also comfortable with the oldschool stack of JS, HTML & CSS.

Frontend and Design

In Swedish we have this word, formge. (form = shape, ge = give). It roughly translates to design, but really it means to give [something] shape. Iâ€™ve always been fascinated with this concept. To create something, sometimes from nothing. I apply this interest in everything from writing code, designing presentations, websites or interfaces, audio engineering and composing.
